text: Alkalimicrobium is a Gram-negative and aerobic genus of bacteria from the family of Rhodobacteraceae with one known species (Alkalimicrobium pacificum). Alkalimicrobium pacificum has been isolated from deep-sea sediments from the Pacific Ocean. ==References== Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Alkalimicrobium
